summary: What happens when you have a “surprise” sequel — one you didn’t know you were going to write — and you have take a story further without compromising what’s come before.  M V Melcer has given this quandry some thought, and explains how it worked out for the sequel that become Inversions.  M V MELCER: […]
title: The Big Idea: M V Melcer

summary: A white guy looks at what it means to be white in 2024, what it's meant in the past and what a hopeful future looks like
title: Let's Talk About White People
